subject: Law
title: Patent Wars in Tech
description: A quick, practical guide to Patent Wars in Tech.

hook.text: Apple, Samsung, Google, and Microsoft spent more on patent lawsuits than on research in some years.

buildup.text: The smartphone patent wars of the 2010s saw tech giants suing each other over thousands of overlapping patents.

discovery.text: Companies built massive patent portfolios as both swords (to attack competitors) and shields (for counter-suits).

twist.text: Many fought to a standstill. Cross-licensing agreements ended the warsâ€”each side agreed to use the other's patents.

climax.text: The wars showed that in tech, patents can slow innovation as much as protect it.

punchline.text: When everyone sues everyone, nobody innovates.
